NFTs are very different from cryptocurrencies because they are not fungible.You cannot manipulate the price of bitcoin or ethereum, but you can very easily manipulate the price of your non-fungible NFT. This is a big problem for the tax authorities.I'm assuming a common situation like you have $100,000 worth of cryptocurrencies and $100,000 worth of NFT tokens. The price of the cryptocurrency in your portfolio has increased by $50,000. To avoid paying tax, you need to sell NFT tokens for $50,000.
